signal_cue_instantly.param: table[ $col = 7, $colSpan = 2, $text = table[ $text = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarEnable then {1001,4825} else {1001,8942}, $color = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarEnable then 'Helper.color.green' else 'Helper.color.red', $halign = 'center', ], $mouseOverText = {33232474,1123}, $onClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarEnable, $onRightClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarEnable, ]

table[ $col = 7, $colSpan = 2, $text = table[ $text = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarFavorsEnable then {1001,4825} else {1001,8942}, $color = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarFavorsEnable then 'Helper.color.green' else 'Helper.color.red', $halign = 'center', ], $mouseOverText = {33232474,1124}, $onClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarFavorsEnable, $onRightClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarFavorsEnable, ]

table[ $col = 7, $colSpan = 2, $text = table[ $text = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarRelationsFixEnable then {1001,4825} else {1001,8942}, $color = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarRelationsFixEnable then 'Helper.color.green' else 'Helper.color.red', $halign = 'center', ], $mouseOverText = {33232474,1142}, $onClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarRelationsFixEnable, $onRightClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarRelationsFixEnable, ]

table[ $col = 7, $colSpan = 2, $text = table[ $text = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarFlavorEnable == true then {1001,4825} else {1001,8942}, $color = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarFlavorEnable == true then 'Helper.color.green' else 'Helper.color.red', $halign = 'center', ], $mouseOverText = {33232474,1136}, $onClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarFlavorEnable, $onRightClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarFlavorEnable, ]

table[ $col = 7, $colSpan = 2, $text = table[ $text = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarDetailedDebug == true then {1001,4825} else {1001,8942}, $color = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarDetailedDebug == true then 'Helper.color.green' else 'Helper.color.red', $halign = 'center', ], $mouseOverText = {33232474,1137}, $onClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarDebugEnable, $onRightClick = ExecuteOption_DynamicWarDebugEnable, ]

table[ $col = 4, $colSpan=5, $text = table[ $text = if $DARelUnlFaction.isrelationlocked then {33232474,138} else {33232474,139}, $color = if $DARelUnlFaction.isrelationlocked then 'Helper.color.red' else 'Helper.color.green', $halign = 'center', ], $mouseOverText = {33232474,1118}, $onClick = ExecuteOption_UnlockRelations, $onRightClick = ExecuteOption_UnlockRelations, $echo = $DARelUnlFaction, ]

table[ $col = 4, $colSpan=5, $text = table[ $text = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarDisabledFactions.indexof.{$DAIgnFaction} then {33232474,141} else {33232474,140}, $color = if $DADVT.$DADynamicWarDisabledFactions.indexof.{$DAIgnFaction} then 'Helper.color.red' else 'Helper.color.green', $halign = 'center', ], $mouseOverText = {33232474,1119}, $onClick = ExecuteOption_IgnoredFactions, $onRightClick = ExecuteOption_IgnoredFactions, $echo = $DAIgnFaction, ]

signal_cue_instantly.comment: This faction does not seek to claim sector ownership.

do_if.value: ($DecreaseRelationsCostTable.{$DARelSelectedFactionOne}.{$DARelSelectedFactionTwo} == 0) and (@$DADVT.$DADynamicWarFavors.{$DARelSelectedFactionOne} gt 0) and ($DARelSelectedFactionOne != faction.player) and ($DARelSelectedFactionTwo != faction.player)

set_value.name: $DecreaseRelationsCostTable.{$DADynamicWarFactionOne}.{$DADynamicWarFactionTwo}
set_value.exact: if ($DARelDecPlayerChange) then 0Cr else (if (@$DADVT.$DADynamicWarFavors.{$DADynamicWarFactionOne} gt 0) then 0Cr else $Cost)

set_value.name: $DecreaseRelationsCostTable.{$DADynamicWarFactionOne}.{$DADynamicWarFactionTwo}
set_value.exact: if ($DARelDecPlayerChange) then 0Cr else (if (@$DADVT.$DADynamicWarFavors.{$DADynamicWarFactionOne} gt 0) then 0Cr else $Cost)

set_value.name: $DecreaseRelationsCostTable.{$DADynamicWarFactionOne}
set_value.exact: table[{$DADynamicWarFactionTwo}=(if ($DARelDecPlayerChange) then 0Cr else (if (@$DADVT.$DADynamicWarFavors.{$DADynamicWarFactionOne} gt 0) then 0Cr else $Cost))]

do_if.value: ($NewAbsoluteRepValue gt $DADVT.$DADynamicWarRelationsAILimit) and ($DARelSelectedFactionOne != faction.player) and ($DARelSelectedFactionTwo != faction.player) and ($DADVT.$DADynamicWarRelationsFixEnable)

debug_text.text: 'MOD: DAMenus Gate -- %s -- PROBLEM WITH GATE TRACKING -- $LocTrackedGates.indexof.{$LocGate}: %s -- $LocTrackedGates.indexof.{$LocGate.exit}: %s'.[player.age,$LocTrackedGates.indexof.{$LocGate},$LocTrackedGates.indexof.{$LocGate.exit}]

'MOD: DAMenus Gate -- %s -- Set %s.%s.%s to active: %s -- Set %s.%s.%s to active: %s'.[player.age,$DAGateLocGate.sector.macro,$DAGateLocGate.zone.macro,$DAGateLocGate.knownname,$DAGateLocGate.isactive,$DAGateLocGateExit.sector.macro,$DAGateLocGateExit.zone.macro,$DAGateLocGateExit.knownname,$DAGateLocGateExit.isactive]
